page.title: 18WELSH MOUNTAIN FARMS-NEATH-2
page.content: About a mile away from this farm is a smaller farm called Lletty Bella. This farm is about{150 years old}and is also a quiet place,being situated far from the main roads. The farmer says he is{self-sufficient}and he can supply almost anything which he and his family needs - and we believe him! The house in the orchard behind this farm has recently been sold to a family from England. One of the most interesting houses in our area was once an{old Tithe {Barn,}which has now been converted into a house. The barn itself was{400 {years old}and it was rebuilt as a house 20 years ago.
